V05bsu011_u:2: ye ca te bodhisattvānāṃ trayaḥ śīlaskandhā uktāḥ /
V05bsu011_u:3_0: saṃvara śīlaṃ kuśaladharmmasaṃgrāhakaśīlaṃ sattvārthakriyāśīlaṃ ca teṣu śikṣitukāmena
V05bsu011_u:3_1: gṛhiṇā vā pravrajitena vā 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksaṃbodhau kṛtapraṇidhānena sahadhārmmikasya
V05bsu011_u:3_2: bodhisattvasya mahāpuṇyanidhānasya vāg vijñaptyartha grahaṇāvabodhasamarthasya pādayornnipatyādhyeṣaṇā kāryā /
V05bsu011_u:6_1: bhagavatāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ sāmīcīṃ kṛttvā teṣāṃ guṇānāmukhīkṛtya
V05bsu011_u:6_2: ghanarasaṃ cetaḥprasādaṃ saṃjanayya nīcairjānumaṇḍalenotkuṭukena vā sthitvā tathāgatapratimāṃ
V05bsu011_u:7: anuprayaccha me kulaputrāyuṣmān bhadanteti vā bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānamiti /
V05bsu011_u:9: na cirasyedānī me 'kṣayasyāprameyasya niruttarasya mahāpuṇyanidhānasya prāptirbhaviṣyatīti /
V05bsu011_u:11: tena punarvvijñena bodhisattvena sa tathā pratipanno bodhisattvo 'vikṣiptena cetasā sthitena vā niṣaṇṇena vā evaṃ syādvacanīyaḥ /
V05bsu011_u:12: śṛṇu tvamevannāman kulaputrāyuṣman bhadanteti vā bodhisattvo 'si bodhau ca kṛtapraṇidhānaḥ /
V05bsu011_u:15_0: pratīcchasi tvamevannāman kulaputrāyuṣmān bhadanteti vā bodhisattvo 'si bodhau kṛtapraṇidhāno
V05bsu011_u:15_1: mamāntikāt sarvvāṇi bodhisattvaśikṣāpadāni sarvvañca bodhisattvaśīlaṃ saṃvaraśīlaṃ
V05bsu011_u:16: yacchīlamanāgatānām bodhisattvānāṃ bhaviṣyati yāni ca śikṣāpadāni /
V05bsu011_u:17: yacchīlametarhi daśasu dikṣu pratyutpannānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ bhavati yāni ca śikṣāpadāni /
V05bsu011_u:18: yeṣu ca śikṣāpadeṣu yeṣu śīleṣvatītāḥ sarvvabodhisattvāḥ śikṣitavantaḥ /
V05bsu011_u:22: samanvāharantu māṃ daśadiglokadhānusannipatitā buddhā bhagavanto bodhisattvāḥ /
V05bsu011_u:23_1: tadanyān vā sattvān samāgamyehajanmanyanyeṣu vā janmāṃ tareṣu mayāpāyaṃ kṛtaṃ kāritamanumoditam
V05bsu011_u:23_2: vā tat sarvvamaikadhyamabhisaṃkṣipya piṇḍayitvā tulayitvā sarvvabuddhabodhisattvānāmācāryyasya
V05bsu011_u:23_3: cāntike 'grayā pravarayā pratideśanayā pratideśayāmi jānan smaran na praticchādayāmi // trirevam //
V05bsu011_u:24_0: sohamevaṃnāmā evaṃdeśitātyaya imaṃ divasamupādāya āvodhimaṇḍaniṣadanāt buddhaṃ bhagavantaṃ
V05bsu011_u:25: so 'hamevaṃnāmā evaṃdeśitātyaya imaṃ divasamupādāya ābodhimaṇḍadiṣadanāddharma śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi śāntaṃ virāgāṇāṃ pravaram /
V05bsu011_u:26: so 'hamevaṃnāmā evaṃdeśitātyaya imaṃ divasamupādāya ābodhimaṇḍaniṣadanādavaivarttikabodhisattvasaṃghaṃ śaraṇaṃ gacchāmi gaṇāṇāṃ śreṣṭham // trirevam //
V05bsu011_u:27: sohamevaṃnāmā evaṃdeśitātyayastriśaraṇagato 'nantasattvadhātūttāraṇāyābhyuddharaṇāya saṃsāraduḥkhāt paritrāṇāya sarvvajñajñāne anuttare pratiṣṭhāpanāya /
V05bsu011_u:28: yathā te atītānāgatapratyutpannā bodhisattvā bodhicittamutpādya buddhatvamadhigatavanto 'dhigamiṣyanti adhigacchanti ca /
V05bsu011_u:29: yathā sarvvabuddhā 'nāvaraṇena buddhajñānena buddh cakṣuṣā jānanti paśyanti yathā dharmmāṇāṃ niḥsvabhāvatāma(?) nujānanti /
V05bsu011_u:30: tena vidhinā ahamevaṃnāmā evaṃnāmna ācāryyasyāntikāt sarvvabuddhabodhisattvānāṃ ca purato 'nuttarāyāṃ samyaksambodhau cittamutpādayāmi // trirevam //
V05bsu011_u:31_1: samyaksaṃbodhau pariṇāmayāmi yadahaṃ loke aśaraṇe alayane aparāyaṇe 'dvipe trāṇaṃ
V05bsu011_u:36: pratigṛhya ca yathāśakti yathābalam yathājñānaṃ kuśalamūlaṃ samāropayāmi /
V05bsu011_u:37_0: itaḥ prabhṛti yatkiñcit dānaṃ dāsyāmi śīlaṃ rakṣiṣyāmi kṣāṃti saṃpādayiṣyāmi vīryamārabhya
V05bsu011_u:37_1: dhyānaṃ samāpatsye prajñayā vyavacāryya upāyakauśalyaṃ vā śikṣiṣye tat sarvvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya //
V05bsu011_u:38: uttarāṃ ca samyaksaṃbodhimārabhya teṣāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ bodhisattvānāṃ mahākāruṇikāṇāṃ mahāyāne sāmicīmanupravrajāmi /
V05bsu011_u:39: anupravrajya bodhisattvo 'haṃ bodhisattva iti māmitaḥ prabhṛtyācāryyo dhārayatu // trirevam //
V05bsu011_u:40: tatastenācāryyeṇa tasyāḥ pratimāyāḥ purato daśasu dikṣu buddhabodhisattvānāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ pādayornnipatya sāmicīṃ kṛtvā evamārocayitavyam /
V05bsu011_u:41: gṛhītamanenaivaṃnāmnā bodhisattvena mamaivaṃnāmno bodhisattvasyāntikāt yāvat trirapi bodhisatvaśīlasaṃvarasamādānam /
V05bsu011_u:42_0: sohamevaṃnāmā bodhisattva ātmānaṃ sākṣibhūtaṃ prajānan asyaivaṃnāmno bodhisattvasya
V05bsu011_u:42_1: paramāryyāṇāṃ viparokṣāṇāmapi sarvatra sarvvasattvānāṃ viparokṣabuddhīnāṃ daśadikṣvanantāparyyanteṣu
V05bsu011_u:44_0: evaṃ punaḥ śīlasaṃvarasamādānakarmmasamāptyanantaraṃ dharmmatā khalveṣā yad daśasu
V05bsu011_u:44_1: dikṣvanantāparyyantesu lokadhātuṣu tathāgatānāṃ tiṣṭhatāṃ dhriyatāṃ yāpayatāṃ mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ
V05bsu011_u:44_2: ca bodhisattvānāṃ tadrupaṃ nimittam prādurbhavati yena teṣāmevaṃ bhavati /
V05bsu011_u:45: evaṃnāmnā bodhisattvena evaṃnāmno bodhisattvasyāntikāt bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvara samādānaṃ samāttamiti //
V05bsu011_u:47: yadi tairguṇairyuktaḥ pudgalo na sannihitaḥ syāt tato bodhisattvena tathāgatapratimāyāḥ purataḥ svayamapi bodhisattvaśīlasaṃvarasamādāne vacanīyam /
V05bsu011_u:49_0: ekāṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ kṛtvā daśasu dikṣvatītānāgatapratyutpannānāṃ buddhānāṃ bhagavatāṃ
V05bsu011_u:49_1: mahābhūmipraviṣṭānāṃ ca bodhisattvānāṃ sāmīcīṃ kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ
V05bsu011_u:50: ahamevaṃnāmā daśasu dikṣu sarvatathāgatān mahābhūmipraviṣṭāṃśca bodhisattvān vijñāpayāmi /
V05bsu011_u:51: teṣāṃ purataḥ sarvvāṇi bodhisatvaśikṣāpadāni sarvvaṃ ca bodhisattvaśīlaṃ samādade /
V05bsu011_u:52: yacchīlamityādi pūrvvavat yāvat bodhisattvo bodhisattva iti /
V05bsu011_u:53: māmitaḥ prabhṛti buddha bhagavanto bodhisattvāśca dhārayantviti vijñaptiḥ // 0 //
